          # @Autowired

          • æ•°ç»„ã€é›†åˆã€map
          public class MovieRecommender {
	
    // æŒ‰ç…§ç±»å‹ï¼Œå°†åŒä¸€ç±»å‹çš„Beanå°è£…åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„é‡Œé¢
    @Autowired
    private MovieCatalog[] movieCatalogs;
    
    // åŒç†
    @Autowired
	private Set<MovieCatalog> movieCatalogs;
    // ...
    
    // åŒç†
    // å…¶ä¸­ key ä¸º bean name ï¼Œ value ä¸º Bean object
    @Autowired(required=false) // é»˜è®¤ trueï¼šå¿…é¡»æ³¨å…¥ï¼ŒIoCå®¹å™¨æ²¡æœ‰è¿™ä¸ªBeanå°±æŠ¥é”™ï¼› falseï¼šIoCå®¹å™¨æœ‰å°±æ³¨å…¥ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰å°±ä¸æ³¨å…¥

          # @Resourceä¸@Autowired

          • AutoWiredé»˜è®¤ä¸º by typeï¼Œè€Œå by name

          • Autowiredæ˜¯springæä¾›ï¼ŒResourceæ˜¯Jdkæœ¬èº«æä¾›
          • @Autowired æ”¯æŒ å­—æ®µï¼Œæ„é€ æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¤šå‚æ•°æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸”å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ @Qualifier è¿›ä¸€æ­¥ç²¾ç¡®çš„ç¼©å°èŒƒå›´

          # @Configuration

          # @Primary

          @Configuration
public class AppConfiguration {

    @Bean
    @Primary
    public Product getProduct(){
        return new Product("ç”µè„‘");
    }
    @Bean
    public Product getProductSecond(){
        return new Product("æ˜¾å¡");
    }
}

@Component
class testConfiguration{

    private Product product;

    @Autowired  // æ³¨å…¥æ—¶ä¼˜å…ˆè€ƒè™‘ getProduct()
    public void setProduct(Product product) {
        this.product = product;
    }
}
          • ä¸ä¹‹å¯¹åº”åŒæ ·æ•ˆæœçš„xmlå®šä¹‰
          <bean class="com.hhyy.vo.Product" primary="true">
    <!-- inject any dependencies required by this bean -->
</bean>

          # @Qualifier

          • å®šä¹‰Bean
          @Configuration
public class AppConfiguration {

    @Bean
    @Primary
    @Qualifier(value = "pro")
    public Product getProduct(){
        return new Product("ç”µè„‘");
    }
    @Bean
    @Qualifier(value = "pro")
    public Product getProductSecond(){
        return new Product("æ˜¾å¡");
    }
}

// ä½¿ç”¨
@Component
class testConfiguration{
    private Set<Product> setPro;
    @Autowired
    public void setSetPro(@Qualifier("pro") Set<Product> pros){
        this.setPro = pros;
    }
    public Set<Product> getSetPro() {
        return setPro;
    }
}

          # @Value

          @Configuration
@PropertySource("classpath:application.properties")
public class AppConfiguration {

    @Bean
    @Primary
    @Qualifier(value = "pro1")
    public Product getProduct(){
        return new Product("ç”µè„‘");
    }
    @Bean
    @Qualifier(value = "pro2")
    public Product getProductSecond(){
        return new Product("æ˜¾å¡");
    }
}
          • application.properties
          catalog.name=MovieCatalog
          • ä½¿ç”¨
          @Component
class testConfiguration{

    private Product product;
    private Product product2;

    private Set<Product> setPro;

    @Value("${catalog.name}")
    public String catalogName;
}

          # åŸºäºJavaçš„å®¹å™¨é…ç½®

          # åŸºæœ¬æ¦‚å¿µï¼š@Bean å’Œ @Configuration

          # é€šè¿‡ä½¿ç”¨ AnnotationConfigApplicationContext å®ä¾‹åŒ–Springå®¹å™¨

          public static void main(String[] args) {
    ApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext(AppConfig.class);
    MyService myService = ctx.getBean(MyService.class);
    myService.doStuff();
}

          # ä½¿ç”¨registeræ³¨å†Œç»„ä»¶

          public static void main(String[] args) {
	AnnotationConfigApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext();
	ctx.register(AppConfig.class, OtherConfig.class);
	ctx.register(AdditionalConfig.class);
	ctx.refresh();
	MyService myService = ctx.getBean(MyService.class);
	myService.doStuff();
}

          # ä½¿ç”¨ @Bean æ³¨è§£

          # ä½¿ç”¨ @Configuration æ³¨è§£

          æ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸€ä¸ªç¥å¥‡çš„ä¾‹å­ï¼Œ

          @Configuration
@ComponentScan(basePackages = {"com.hhyy"})
@PropertySource("classpath:application.properties")
public class AppConfiguration {

    @Bean
//    @Primary
//    @Qualifier(value = "pro1")
    public Product product(){
        System.out.println("configuration product....");
        return new Product("ç”µè„‘");
    }

    @Bean
//    @Qualifier(value = "pro2")
    public Order order(){
        return new Order("æ˜¾å¡",product());
    }
}

          ä¸Šé¢è¿™ä¸ªæ¡ˆä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œorder()æ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨äº† product()ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶productæ–¹æ³•è¢« @Bean ä¿®é¥°ã€‚æœ€ç»ˆæ˜¯å¦ä¼šå‡ºç° product() æ–¹æ³•è¢«åˆ›å»ºä¸¤æ¬¡çš„æƒ…å†µå‘¢ï¼Ÿç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯ä¸ä¼šï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¢« @configuration ä¿®é¥°çš„ç±»éƒ½è¢« GCLIB ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªå­ç±»è¿›è¡Œä»£ç†ã€‚åœ¨@Bean æ–¹æ³•ä¹‹é—´çš„è·¨æ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨æ—¶ï¼Œä¼šä¸»åŠ¨æ‹¦æˆªï¼Œå­æ–¹æ³•é¦–å…ˆæ£€æŸ¥å®¹å™¨ä¸­æ˜¯å¦æœ‰å¯¹åº”çš„ç¼“å­˜ï¼ˆç»“åˆä¸Šé¢çš„æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼šä¼šæ£€æŸ¥IoCå®¹å™¨ä¸­æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»æ‹¥æœ‰ productBeançš„å®ä¾‹ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰æ‰ä¼šè°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»æ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡Œåˆ›å»ºï¼‰ã€‚

          å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ @Configuration(proxyBeanMethods = false) æ¥å–æ¶ˆ@Bean æ–¹æ³•ä¹‹é—´çš„è·¨æ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨çš„æ‹¦æˆªï¼Œæˆ–è€…åœ¨ @Component ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ @Beanã€‚

          # æ„å»ºåŸºäºJavaçš„é…ç½®

          # @Import

          @Configuration
public class ConfigA {

    @Bean
    public A a() {
        return new A();
    }
}

@Configuration
@Import(ConfigA.class)
public class ConfigB {

    @Bean
    public B b() {
        return new B();
    }
}
          • åˆ›å»ºå®¹å™¨
          public static void main(String[] args) {
    ApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext(ConfigB.class);

    // now both beans A and B will be available...
    A a = ctx.getBean(A.class);
    B b = ctx.getBean(B.class);
}

          # Beanå®šä¹‰é…ç½®

          • æ¥æ”¶å£°æ˜å‘¨æœŸçš„å›è°ƒ
          public class BeanOne {
    public void init() {
        // initialization logic
    }
}

public class BeanTwo {
    public void cleanup() {
        // destruction logic
    }
}

@Configuration
public class AppConfig {

    @Bean(initMethod = "init")
    public BeanOne beanOne() {
        return new BeanOne();
    }
	// @Bean(destroyMethod = "") å…³é—­é»˜è®¤é”€æ¯æ–¹æ³•
    // @Bean({"dataSource", "subsystemA-dataSource", "subsystemB-dataSource"}) Beançš„å¤šä¸ªåå­—
    @Bean(destroyMethod = "cleanup")
    // bean çš„æè¿°
    @Description("Provides a basic example of a bean")
    public BeanTwo beanTwo() {
        return new BeanTwo();
    }
}
